title: For Sale:  Hel-Star 6 Helmet Light
postcontent:
Manufactured in the U.S.A

HEL-STAR 6™ is the latest in a series of purpose-built helmet mounted LED lights designed for airborne/MFF, tactical and other military operations.

HEL-STAR 6 combines the basic features of the earlier HEL-STAR 4® & HEL-STAR 5® multi-function marker lights into a compact, integrated design with enhanced omni-directional visibility, easy battery replacement, and waterproofness to 130 feet.

Improved sliding switches enhance tactile feel and provide positive, intuitive control between the two operating modes and four user-defined functions. Functions can be selected from virtually any combination of White, four different color options, and IR – either flashing or steady. Variable flash rates, intensities and coded signals provide expanded IFF capability.

Independent testing has confirmed that the HEL-STAR 6 exceeds the FAA’s 3 statute mile visibility requirement. HEL-STAR 6 is built on a platform that allows new technology to be incorporated as it becomes available. As mission demands shift and expand, HEL-STAR 6 can evolve with changing user needs.

title: For Sale:  Aguila Super Colibri Ammunition 22 Long Rifle 20 Grain Lead Solid Point
postcontent:
Aguila Super Colibri Ammunition 22 Long Rifle 20 Grain Lead Solid Point

Aguila Super Colibri Armmunition has no powder, relying on only the primer to propel the bullet down the bore. The result is an extremely quiet rimfire round, perfect for close-range pest control or quiet plinking.

title: For Sale:  308 Win. Match Grade Unprimed Brass - Box 50
postcontent:
308 Winchester Match Grade Cases Packed per 50 - This is some of the best brass I have ever used. Excellent uniformity!

Hornady takes extra time and care in the creation of their cases, and produce them in smaller lots. This is the only way to ensure each case meets their strict quality standards. Hornady cases offer reloaders excellent uniformity in case wall thickness, case weight, internal capacity and in the primer pocket and flash hole. They measure for consistently tight wall concentricity, and even run their cases through a pressure calibration test to ensure uniform case expansion. Finally, each case is hand-inspected.

What does this mean to you? Proper seating of the bullet not only in the case, but in the barrel as well. Consistent charges and pressures. Ultimately, it means optimal velocity and repeatable accuracy.

The extra time and effort Hornady spends has another benefit you'll enjoy. They've built their cases so well, you'll be surprised how many more reloads you can get from them over most competitive cases. It's incentive to reload that case and try for an even more memorable shot next time around.

Some reloaders treat brass as a commodity; something to be bought in bulk at the cheapest price possible without regard to quality. At Hornady, they treat brass as the foundation for what could be the most memorable shot of your life. Reload with a case you can count on every time. Look for the Hornady headstamp.

I have for trade an AR-15 Carbine. I assembled it about a year ago and don't have much use for it. I can fire a shot and then it doesn't want to load the next round, or sticks shut. I don't know or care enough about AR-15s to fix it. I've fired it with a .22 LR bolt conversion and it ran 3 magazines without a hiccup. My coworker who has a lot of experiences with ARs said its probably the ammo I've used with it (cheap steel cased Russian stuff) but could be something wrong with the gas system. I'm sure its a relatively easy fix for someone who knows ARs better than I do. I sold my AK to fund this thing and now I'm trying to get another AK

Stag-15 Lower
PSA LPK

title: For Sale:  NIB Springfield XD(M) .45 cal with Gear Kit for $585! (MSRP $705)
postcontent:
Click on: http://www11.davidsonsinc.com/Dealers/ConsumerViewPopup.aspx?sid=XDM94545BHC&did=928665&from=popup

The Standards
In 2001, Springfield Armory® set out to show its customers, the firearms industry, and the rest of the world a whole new standard in ergonomic design and available features. 
With the introduction of the XD® polymer pistol, they did just that….

Loaded Chamber Indicator The loaded chamber indicator allows the shooter to verify visually or by touch, and without a doubt, that there is a round in the chamber.

Striker Status The loaded chamber indicator allows the shooter to verify visually or by touch, and without a doubt, that there is a round in the chamber. The shooter can check the striker status indicator by sight or touch to verify the striker is in the cocked position.

USA Trigger System™ The Ultra Safety Assurance USA Trigger System™ guards against accidental discharge from dropping or bumping by locking the XD's trigger in place until direct, rearward pressure is applied.

The loaded chamber indicator allows the shooter to verify visually or by touch, and without a doubt, that there is a round in the chamber. [The shooter can check the striker status indicator by sight or touch to verify the striker is in the cocked position. 

Grip Safety Allows it to fire only when the shooter has a firm grip on the pistol.

Design
Moving beyond comfort and fit, Springfield Armory® explores new territory in tactile response. With the introduction of The (M) Factor™, Springfield's reputation in ergonomics, intuitive operation, and handling is taken to a whole new level.

(M)odel Countour Frame
The ideal grip angle of the XD® has been carried over to the XD(M)®, but slightly modified contours in the grip will leave you wondering whether you're gripping the gun or it's gripping you. 
(M)ajor Grasp Slide Serrations
Deeper, longer, and more slide serrations equals a better more penetrating grasp. New! 3.8 model with slip resistant slide serrations 

(M)odel Contour Frame
The ideal grip angle of the XD® has been carried over to the XD(M)®, but slightly modified contours in the grip will leave you wondering whether you're gripping the gun or it's gripping you. 

(M)ega-Lock Texture
The "all-terrain" look of the new XD(M)® isn't about cosmetics, it's about function. 
The angle and depth of each contour in the grip has been calculated for maximized control vertically, horizontally and torsionally.

Technology
Advances in manufacturing allow Springfield to take the XD(M)® series to a whole new level in precision. 
With an incredible attention to detail, no handgun company approaches precision engineering like Springfield Armory®.

(M)atch Grade Barrel
Rivaling aerospace manufacturing, the XD(M)® match-grade barrel takes precision manufacturing to a whole new level never available within the firearms industry.

(M)elonite®
Traditional black oxide finishes are a few millionths of an inch thick and offer no corrosion resistance. 
The rugged Melonite® finish on the XD(M)® is a salt bath nitriding process that leaves a thick, corrosion-resistant, hard surface. 

(M)inimal Reset Trigger
The new XD(M)® trigger has the shortest travel of any currently available polymer pistol along with a similarly short reset which keeps you on target with greater ease for faster, more accurate follow-up shots.

Innovations
The same spirit of innovation that fueled the success of the XD® is now captured in the all new XD(M)® line of polymer pistols. From subtle influences to industry firsts, the XD(M)® series pushes the boundaries on what a polymer pistol should be.

M)aximum Reach Magazine Release
The modified contour of the new XD(M)® grip is most evident near the magazine release. Operation of the magazine release is easily accomplished by virtually any size hand without twisting or adjusting from the shooting grip.

(M)inimal Error Disassembly
Innovation doesn't always happen by adding to a product. Sometimes, it's what you simplify. By removing the need to pull the trigger during disassembly, we've made the process easier and faster.

(M)ega Capacity Magazine
The new XD(M)® Compact 9MM magazine holds an incredible 13 rounds in a flush fitting magazine and 19 rounds with the XD(M) GEAR™ Mag 
X-Tension™ (USPAT .7191556). The XD(M)® is the largest capacity production polymer pistol in both the 
.40 caliber and 9MM, accommodating 16 + 1 and 19 + 1 rounds, respectively.

Personalization
Usually, handgun customization is an after-market decision. With the XD(M)®, you get more personalized choices for a custom fit right out of the case.

(M)agazine X-Tensions™ 
With interchangeable backstraps and Mag X-Tensions™ , SPRINGFIELD ARMORY® has added another level of comfort. Personalize your grip length to fit your capacity needs. (Compact model only)

(M)ould-Tru Backstraps
With our interchangeable backstraps, we've added another level of comfort. Personalize your grip by choosing one of three backstraps for a more custom fit.

(M)ulti-Adjust Rail System™
A triple-position Picatinny rail readily accepts lights, lasers or other accessories. More importantly, it allows them to be adjusted to the shooter's hand position.

(M)ulti-Use Carrying Case
Your total XD(M)® experience starts the day you open your case. In fact, it starts with your case. This rugged case is as durable as the XD(M)® it houses and can be re-tasked to protect any number of items from a laptop to multiple XD(M)® pistols.

ACCEPTED PAYMENTS include: PayPal(will add the approx 2.9% merchant's fee), USPS Postal and other money orders, and Bank Teller's Checks; the item will be shipped to you immediately upon my receipt of this type of payment. PERSONAL checks are also accepted BUT shipment will be delayed until your check has cleared my bank. 

These items are for domestic sales ONLY, as firearms and parts are subject to the International Traffic in Arms Regulations. I am thankful that you are viewing my listings and I want you to be happy with my products and service!

title: For Sale:  S&W 1911PD Gunsite Limited Edition, Commander sized.
postcontent:
This is the increasingly difficult to find Smith & Wesson 1911PD Gunsite Edition pistol. 

The lusterous blueing on the slide, barrel and other hard parts is nicely contrasted by the lovely walnut stocks with the carved S&W and Gunsite Raven logo's which is echoed in the Raven engraving on the receiver. The frame is made from Scandium. The sights are Novak low rise and make for a smooth, no snag draw from a holster (no front gold bead). The barrel is 4 1/4" with a match grade barrel bushing. The trigger is adjustable. The gun comes in the factory lockable protective case with the original manual, barrel wrench, 2 S&W OEM ACT made, 8 round magazines and sealed packet containing the sample factory fired casing. 

I am the original owner and have fired this very accurate pistol less than 100 rounds of Federal and RP 45 ACP hardball. The earlier manufactured pistols like this one (SN FSP 0798) were completely hand fitted for maximum accuracy and reliability. The gun is in completely stock, unmodified condition since new. I will offer approximately 2 and 1/2 boxes of new RP (2 boxes of 50 rounds 230gr RN, approximately 1/2 box of Federal 230gr RN) to the buyer at my cost from about a year ago.

I play by the rules. For sale face to face only to bonafide Arkansas resident with proof of Ar residency, otherwise it has to go through (or sale to) an FFL. 

I also believe in describing an item accurately. Feel free to check my feedback on ebay (handle- achildofthesky )I am an individual (no sales tax!) and not a dealer or business and because of this, the gun is sold with out warranties of any type on my part and all sales are final. That said, if you have been looking for a truely nice example of these accurate and finely assembled and increasingly hard to find pistols you will not be dissapointed with this one. I have a couple of other high quality collectable guns I will be selling to help generate funds for a home purchase. 

Please note this offer expires on Friday evening as I am moving. Please, no "tire kickers, Lookie Lou's or time wasters", I am selling a exrtemely high quality,hand fitted handgun at a very attractive price. You will NEVER see another one in this area. Don't miss out. Regret sucks!

Be safe and thanks for looking

title: For Sale/Trade:  16 boxes (320rds) 223 Rem Winchester Ranger Ammo
postcontent:
I have 16 boxes of Winchester Ranger 223 Rem 55 gr. Frangible SF 

This is a pretty cool round, it is lead free, the bullet is made of powdered metal, so when it hits a hard surface (ie steel plate) it completly disperses it energy, so there is no worry of dangerous fragments flying around to cause an unnecessary injury.  

Also, this ammo would be excellent for home defense because it will not travel through many walls and be less likely to cause collateral damage, or for target practice bc of no risk of fragmentation.  On soft targets the bullet acts more like a hp round.  This round is optimized for use in 1:7 - 1:9 twist barrels, which is the majority of AR-15s.  I have shot these out of my Rock River and a custom rifle with a YHM barrel and have had excellent accuracy out of both (at 25 yards, both rifles leave ragged holes).

$15 a box, which is a steal.  Or if you buy all, I will take $200 which is $12.50 a box.  This stuff retails for over $20 a box.
